title: Fragment of a Hand From a Colossal Statue
period: Late Period, Saite Period, or later
description:
Fragment from an over life-size statue in brownish-black basalt. Preserved are the thumb and first two fingers of a hand represented clenched in a fist.

Condition: Chips in tip of thumb; otherwise good.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
